snippet: Isaiah Thomas' preschool sons, James and Jaiden, did their best to sit quietly during his postgame news conference on Sunday before the elder tyke leaned over the microphone and said, "my daddy ... is the best basketball player."...
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas' preschool sons, James and Jaiden, did their best to sit quietly during his postgame news conference on Sunday before the elder tyke leaned over the microphone and said, "my daddy ... is the best basketball player."

headline.main: Celtics Beat Hawks 104-95 in OT, Series Tied 2-2
headline.print_headline: Celtics Beat Hawks 104-95 in OT, Series Tied 2-2
